瓬字的基本解释

瓬
fǎng
古代制作瓦器的工人。
瓶。

瓬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǎng］
［《廣韻》分网切，上養，非。］
用黏土捏制陶器。

瓬字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　瓬； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页748第15
【唐韻】分兩切【集韻】【韻會】甫兩切【正韻】妃兩切，?音倣。【說文】周家摶埴之工也。【徐註】摶，團也。埴，黏土也。引周禮冬官考工記，瓬人爲簋豆。○按《周禮》今本作旊。　又【字彙補】人名。宋王安石姪瓬字元鈞，旋字元龍，皆以不附安石而貶。

瓬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瓬字的起名意思

暂无。

瓬
Basic explanation of words
瓬
fǎng
Workers making pottery in ancient times.
bottle.
瓬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fǎng］
["Guangyun" is divided into nets, raised on top, not. ]
Use clay to make pottery.
瓬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Zi Department] 　瓬; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 748 15
[Tang Yun] Divided into two [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Two cuts [Zheng Yun] Concubine in two cuts, imitation of sound. [Said the text] Zhou Jia Tuan's work is also. [Xu Note] Tuan, Tuan Ye. Yan, clay too. Quoting Zhou Lidong official test work record, 瓬ren is Guidou. ○ Press "Zhou Li" for this edition.　[Word Supplement] Names. Song Wang Anshi's wife Yuanjun, the rotary character Yuanlong, are all degraded for not attaching an stone.
